channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Beijing and Doha are reinforcing one another. Washington must ensure that they don’t do so by weakening America.

item.title: Trump says his relationship with Musk is over, slamming the door on the once-staunch ally who tried to de-escalate their feud
item.description: Trump added that he has "no intention of speaking" to Musk anytime soon, saying "I’m too busy doing other things.”

item.title: Trump to stop at Camp David for work retreat
item.description: President Trump plans to leave his New Jersey golf club this weekend and take a brief retreat with administration principals at Camp David on Sunday.

item.title: A hot trend in the housing market is Gen Z buying homes with siblings
item.description: BofA found that 22% of Gen Z homeowners bought their home with siblings, surging from 12% in 2024 and just 4% in 2023.
